title: To Strike a Climate Deal, Poor Nations Say They Need Trillions From Rich Ones
content:
1. To Strike a Climate Deal, Poor Nations Say They Need Trillions From Rich Ones  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Calls for urgent action on climate change ahead of COP26 leaders summit  Global News
  3. COP26: Does a climate summit need 25,000 people? And more questions  BBC News
  4. How will COP26 impact Celtic and Rangers fixtures?  The Scotsman
  5. The host of Cop26 needs to be a master of diplomacy. Unfortunately, it’s Boris Johnson  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 気候変動対策のためには、富裕国から何兆円もの資金が必要だと貧困国が訴えています。
为了达成气候协议，穷国说他们需要富国提供数万亿的资金
爲了達成氣候協議，窮國說他們需要富國提供數萬億的資金
